document:
<sentence id="s1" text="Rationale: Oncogenic STAT3 signaling activation and 3p22-21.3 locus alteration are common in multiple tumors, especially carcinomas of the nasopharynx, esophagus and lung.">
<sentence id="s2" text="DLEC1 was frequently downregulated in ESCC, lung and NPC cell lines and primary tumors, but was readily expressed in normal tissues and immortalized normal epithelial cells, with mutations rarely detected.">
<sentence id="s3" text="DLEC1 methylation was frequently detected in ESCC tumors and correlated with lymph node metastasis, tumor recurrence and progression, with li>DLEC1 as the most frequently methylated among the established 3p22.2 tumor suppressors (li>RASSF1A, PLCD1 and li>ZMYND10/BLU).">
